ideas.title: eSIM adoption is on the rise thanks to travel and device compatibility
ideas.description: As a technology, eSIM has been around for a decade now. However, global eSIM adoption was around 3% last year and will only cross 5% this year. Despite these figures, analysts, eSIM-providing startups, and investors are bullish about eSIM's upward trajectory, largely thanks to travel.
hooks: eSIM: The Travel Tech Revolution You Can't Ignore
Global Connectivity Just Got Way Easier
